name: bundle_offer
description: Product bundle or combo deal | USE: bundle, package deal, combo offer, multiple products together, buy together, product set | NOT: single product, flash sale, service package

fieldPrompt.logo_url: Enter the logo image URL (PNG/SVG recommended).
fieldPrompt.promo_line1: Enter the first line of the promo headline (e.g., 'PROMO')
fieldPrompt.promo_line2: Enter the second line of the promo headline (e.g., 'BUNDLES')
fieldPrompt.offer_text: Enter the offer text (e.g., 'GRAB 2 BOWLS FOR JUST $24')
fieldPrompt.button1_text: Enter the first button text (e.g., 'ORDER NOW')
fieldPrompt.product_image_url: Enter the URL for the product image (16:9 recommended)
fieldPrompt.background_color: Enter the background color (hex, also used for price text)
fieldPrompt.accent_primary_color: Enter the primary accent color (hex, used for promo headline and price circle background)
fieldPrompt.accent_secondary_color: Enter the secondary accent color (hex, used for footer button background)
fieldPrompt.text_color: Enter the text color (hex, used for all text elements)
fieldPrompt.custom_css: Optional: Enter custom CSS to override/extend default styles
fieldPrompt.custom_html: Optional: Enter custom HTML to replace or extend the default template structure

components.html_content:
${promo_line1} ${promo_line2}
${offer_text}
${price_text}
${button1_text} ${button2_text}
${custom_html}
